name: Carlos Rivas
summary: Experienced Senior Frontend & developer with 6+ years, specializing in React.js, Next.js, Node.js, and Shopify integrations. Skilled at building scalable, high-performance web and eCommerce applications with clean architecture and reusable components. Adept at leading teams, mentoring juniors, and delivering seamless user experiences. Passionate about driving innovation in Web3 and modern web technologies.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.summary: Focused on building high-performance, responsive, and component-driven web applications using Next.js for the frontend and Shopify for backend integrations. Emphasized clean architecture, reusable code, and smooth user experiences across devices.
highlights: Developed Next.js applications with a strong focus on performance, SEO, and scalability.
Integrated Shopify backend APIs to manage products, carts, and checkout flows.
Built custom Shopify storefronts using React components and dynamic data fetching.
Implemented responsive, accessible UIs with optimized animations and transitions.
Worked with REST and GraphQL APIs for data handling and dynamic content.
Collaborated on design implementation, ensuring pixel-perfect and user-focused interfaces.
Managed version control and deployments using Git / GitHub and modern build tools.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.summary: Focused on building dynamic, component-driven web applications using Next.js and Node.js. Emphasized code reusability, UI performance, and responsive design, ensuring seamless experiences across devices.
highlights: Developed modern, server-rendered applications with Next.js, improving performance and SEO.
Built reusable components and optimized code structure for scalability.
Enhanced UI/UX through smooth animations, transitions, and accessibility best practices.
Integrated RESTful APIs and handled client-server data efficiently with Node.js.
Focused on responsive layouts, ensuring pixel-perfect and performant interfaces across devices.
